1: Yala Datuguli maana bɔra i ye wa?
2: O don, ɲɛda dogoyalenw bɛ in.
4: A na jeni tasuma la, min ka farin,
5: A na lami kɔji tobilen na.
6: Dumuni t'u ye ni ngɔni tɛ ,
7: a tɛ tloli kɛ wa a tɛ kariyali kɛ ka bɔ kɔngɔ ma.
8: O don, ɲɛda nɛɛmalenw bɛ in.
9: Jen kɛra a ka walɛw ma
11: A te kuma fu mɛn yen.
12: Kojiw bɛ yen minnu bɛ boli.
17: U tɛ lajɛlikɛ ka taaa ɲɔgɔmɛ ma wa, a danna cogo min?
18: ani ka taa sankolo ma, a kɔrɔtara cogo min?
19: ani ka taa kuluw ma, u turula cogo min?
20: ani ka taa dugukolo ma, a fɛnsɛnra cogo min?
21: Waajuli kɛ, i ye waajulikɛla de ye,
22: wa i tɛ karabalibaa ye u kan.
23: fɔ min y'a kɔdon ka kafiri.
24: Ala n'a ɲangi ni ɲangili belebeleba ye.
25: U ka labanyɔrɔ b'anw de ma.
26: O kɔfɛ, U lajatɛ b'anw de kan.
